Text:
This is hot off the press! I just made this myself and it is the first 1 on the internet.

1/24/08
Thanks. So should we read this last?
it is the thrid book in the hutners blade triliogy.
I appreciate the effort with your textaloud but it will never replace the meaning by inflection of the human voice...I'll be waiting for a human voice version but once again, thanks.

I have read quite a few audio books myself into mp3 format on my computer..it is much better than TA, like the guy before me said..no inflection in the voices...very good effort but i would rather hear the book read by you than a computer. i have three of the drizzt dourden series read by TA and its ok at first but after a while i find my self paying attention to what im doing and not the story :) and i cant have that at work ;)

"The Wheel Of Time. Perfect copy of all 14 books."
There are only 12 books.
Thanks man I own all the books also, just wondering if you were gonna make one for the Pirate King also.
Very nice. I am also looking for The Ghost King. The last of the Transitions series. If anyone has it, please upload!
Thank you for the audio book but i have to add. part 15 which i am going to guess you yourself made, was quiet immature i am glad i listened to it before i let my son.
